3 September 2008

New Google web browser

by Aaron Lord

The new Google Chrome browser launched today. (It’s still in beta, but so is Gmail!) I downloaded it at work and I’m hooked! Here’s the super-cool comic book that explains how it works. (Warning: nerd-factor is very, very high.)<div class="blogger-post-footer"></div>
